channel.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
channel.description: Hey, I need a lil bit of help ><. Started watching the anime tv show and I effing love it (even though its sooo retarded at times haha) and I can't seem to find where to watch the second season (they had released the second season). Anyone know where I could watch it/point me in the right direction? Been searching and a lot of its been removed for some reason </3. It'd need to be english subbed though ><.

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I do like my ecchi :3, this gives me plenty to watch :D. Thanks guys :].

I’m so sad, watched the last episode of rosario + vampire, never realised I liked it that much XD. Worst thing when a show you like is finished </3.

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2

item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

High School DxD, Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai, Kiss X Sis, DearS, Girls Bravo, Futakoi, Haiyore Nyaruko-san, Mayo Chiki!, Tenchi Universe, Sekirei, To Love Ru, Majikoi!, Sora No Otoshimono, and Samurai Harem if you like ecchi.

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Thanks for all the info+ suggestions guys. Almost out of anime/ecchi to watch and I loooove anime/ecchi haha.
I will be sure to check out your list when I get home, and 0.o it makes sense that he/she made hentai haha.

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:7, topic:462554”]Hotd is good but the nudeness etc was abit toooo much, at first it put me off then a few months later I liked it.
You’ll probably like this ecchi then:P.
Yeah they will be making a second season cause the first one was really popular;o and they said so themselves ><.
Ah ty, I’ll give it a go when I go home:)[/quote]If you think HOTD had lots of nudeness in it, you obviously haven’t watched Elfen Lied (it’s a great show, I suggest watching it). And I wouldn’t say it’s the ecchi I like, I like more of the survival/yandere/thriller/supernatural anime (Mirai Nikki, Deadman Wonderland, Death Note, Elfen Lied, Etc).

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:462554”]HOTD was aimed to be ecchi because the author is a hentai writer. There won’t be a second season unless the author decides to write a second volume to HOTD.

I suggest checking out the anime that I have in this list:
http://myanimelist.net/animelist/Ituharu[/quote]Announcement at the anime convention about season 2:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1pF38z_ZWoY&feature=player_embedded#![/youtube]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

HOTD was aimed to be ecchi because the author is a hentai writer. There won’t be a second season unless the author decides to write a second volume to HOTD.

I suggest checking out the anime that I have in this list:
http://myanimelist.net/animelist/Ituharu

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Hotd is good but the nudeness etc was abit toooo much, at first it put me off then a few months later I liked it.
You’ll probably like this ecchi then:P.
Yeah they will be making a second season cause the first one was really popular;o and they said so themselves ><.
Ah ty, I’ll give it a go when I go home:)

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:5, topic:462554”]Its an ecchi tv series.
To sum it up its about a vampire and guy at a school of monsters which is only for monsters. The human isn’t aloud but its kept a secret and its basically how they overcome obstacles that gets thrown at them. A lot of its sexually humoured tbh, its not the best anime/ecchi but its decent:P. Its not as bad as HOTD for its sexual humour though.[/quote]HOTD was amazing though… And at the Anime Convention they announced they were going to do a season 2… But I thinks they were lying now…

Also, use animeultima.tv. It loads really fast for me (If you have the official AU video loader, sometimes they don’t ).

Read full topic

item.title: [Anime show] Rosario vampire season 2
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Its an ecchi tv series.
To sum it up its about a vampire and guy at a school of monsters which is only for monsters. The human isn’t aloud but its kept a secret and its basically how they overcome obstacles that gets thrown at them. A lot of its sexually humoured tbh, its not the best anime/ecchi but its decent:P. Its not as bad as HOTD for its sexual humour though.

Read full topic
